inclusion.criterion: Inspiratory Muscle Training Program with Threshold IMT device
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The Mini-mental test score is above 23
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other neurological or orthopedic problems that affect functionality and balance, other than stroke
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: High blood pressure, heart disease which may prevent rehabilitation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have undergone thoracic or cardiovascular surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Agnosia or a person with visual impairment,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The medical condition is not stable,
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
